website_summaries.verdict: If you're leery of traditional nonstick cooking surfaces, give this ceramic nonstick griddle a try.
pros: Ceramic nonstick with cast aluminum construction
Base is cool-touch on front and sides
Low-profile design lets you use it as a buffet server
Backstop ledge keeps items and grease off counter
cons: May not heat evenly over time

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago and I’ve only used it a handful of times. Each time was an issue. Pancakes would get stuck on it. Even grilling something as simple as shrimp which had oils added. It was a horrible purchase, I wish I would’ve known it was defective. Would not recommend or buy again. Wish I could return and get a refund. We had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: luis romero

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick surface doesn’t hold up like the traditional black non-stick
customer_reviews.text: My last presto griddle surface held up for about 7 years. This new age non-stick surface held up for about 6 months before food starting sticking to it. Cooking eggs in a nightmare
customer_reviews.author: Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves It.
customer_reviews.text: Versatile cooking surface. We cook everything from pancakes and bacon to Big Steaks. Easy clean-up, nothing sticks. I'm going to make a little foot for the rear to gently slope it so that the grease runs into the trap in front. It's not really necessary but my wife asked me if I could do it. I'll post a picture of the foot modification if anybody is interested.
customer_reviews.author: Idahodian

customer_reviews.title: Versatility increases it's value
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting a lot from this since it was so cheap, but the nonstick is really easy to clean, it heats up evenly and quickly. Makes it easy to make a large batch of pancakes or bacon! I've even started using it when I don't want to dirty 2 pans when I sear veggies or cook meats at home. It's nice to brown beef on too, because you can drain the fat easily. I didn't think going into this that I would use this for much more than breakfast for dinner, but it's a really versatile appliance that honestly has replaced a lot of the use of my cooktop.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for 4 months, using it once every week to 2 weeks max. I love the nonstick coating. I had some sticking issues but realized my temp was too high for what I was cooking. Small adjustment made, still works great. I can see the outline of the underlying heat souce on the cooktop, but it works just fine regardless. No biggie.
customer_reviews.author: ThinkerBelle

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Hot Spots
customer_reviews.text: I loathe this griddle. I've been cooking for 40+ years, and can't understand the reviews that say it has even heat distribution. Perhaps those are paid reviews. The only reason I've given it two stars is because it has held up well. I've never put it in my dishwasher, because it doesn't fit. Food sticks to the surface, and I have to continually move food around to keep from burning. I also strongly prefer a griddle with higher sides, I've discovered, because it's almost impossible to use a splatter shield with this appliance. I can't wait until the day I can throw this griddle in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Griddle
customer_reviews.text: I have had this griddle for about a year and a half now. It's easy to write a good review for a new product but I wanted to write this now because I just used it again today and was thinking of how great it still is after all this time. The food cooks so well on it and the clean-up is super easy. It is my go-to piece of cookware and I am still impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Broken twice .. upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and twice arrived broken though box did not appear damaged. I called to see if they could put the whole box into another box instead of just màiling in Original box. Person on phone didn't seem to understand what I wanted. I'll but at a store next time I go to town.
customer_reviews.author: BPLopez

customer_reviews.title: Great griddle without the burn lines - clean looking pancakes!
customer_reviews.text: No more burn marks! No more uneven cooking! No more stuck pancakes! I just love my gift to myself. Cooks pancakes evenly, you do not see the burn line like the competing products. Con: The griddle feet do not have anything to prevent it from sliding on the counter. I paid $5 to add cork feet pads so now it does not scratch or slide on me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Best electric griddle ever!
customer_reviews.text: So far I like everything about this product and haven't found anything that I don't like about it. My sister has had this product for awhile and loves it. When I visited her I noticed she was using this grill and I asked her about it. She raved about it and recommended it so when I returned home I ordered one and I have been using it ever since. No problems, easy to clean, easy to use, and grills great. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice Electric Griddle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this griddle to replace an identical size older Teflon non-stick Presto griddle I owned that began to wear. The first thing I noticed was how much slicker the ceramic surface was over my last griddle. This is something that has definitely improved with newer models. Clean up is super easy, usually only needing a wet towel to wipe clean, as nothing seems to stick to this thing. Temperature seems to hold steady across the griddle area, and after a few weeks of use it still looks brand new. I wish I would have upgraded sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy. Easy Clean Up.
customer_reviews.text: I already own a slightly older model of this griddle. I love the new one, it's just a little more powerful. The top is completely nonstick. The design makes flipping pancakes really easy and minimizes mess. It also allows for easy clean up. I have used a few different electric griddle and this is by far my favorite because it's much easier to clean than any of the others I've tried. I'm super satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Does not exhibit non stick property at all
customer_reviews.text: It's not entirely non stick. After every use the marks on the surface stay permanently. Eventually the whole gray ceramic coating become black and ugly real soon. The one without the ceramic worked a lot better and was non stick
customer_reviews.author: Sohail Afaq

customer_reviews.title: Nice even temperatures
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome griddle. Checked it against an infrared thermometer and it I’d very accurate...not exactly but when testing one device against another, its hard to say which is a little off. Honestly, my pancakes do just fine at 345 and 360 so who cares? The important thing is the temp is very consistent from end to end. I only wish the drip tray was a little tighter but the only thing I use it for is pancakes so, again, who cares?
customer_reviews.author: Richard Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Basic but good
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent griddle that meets basic needs. I bought it primarily for pancakes, but have used it for several other things to include sandwiches and burritos. It heats up quickly and is easy to wipe down after use. The drip tray does not "lock" into placeso if you move your griddle from a cabinet for use you will likely drop it a few times. It's a slightly annoying feature, but not a deal breaker. Overall, I would recommend this for the most basic uses.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyMcCullars

customer_reviews.title: Great griddle!
customer_reviews.text: This griddle is great, pancake don’t stick bacon grease cleans off easily. I purchased this to replace a basic non-stick griddle of the same size that the non-stick coating did not last after cooking bacon grease and having a very hard time cleaning it off, but this one it basically just washed off with water. I don’t regret purchasing it one bit.
customer_reviews.author: rustyk123

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third griddle we've gone through in the last year, and we rarely use it. First had hot and cold spots, second was impossible to clean (non-stick not!!). This one has a great non-stick coating that really does as claimed. Immersible if you defeat the non-stick and need a big clean up. Cooking surface is a nice size, and the temperature is even, even at the edges. Pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: How easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: The finish on grill doesn't clean as well. My old one just wore out but this one doesn't seem to clean very well. We only do pancakes so wonder if it continues. Need to have a replacement grill. The pancakes stick and you can't clean the top. Will not buy another Presto grill especially those made in China
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Nice griddle, but handle it with care!
customer_reviews.text: Love the porcelain surface and how easy it is to clean. Food cooks evenly and pancakes and grilled sandwiches taste terrific. I dropped the griddle and the cheap plastic handle smashed in many pieces. We glued it back together so it is still usable but I wish it had a stronger handle.
customer_reviews.author: L. R. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Uneven heat
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this griddle for four months and use it about once a week. While the ceramic surface is great the heat has gotten quite uneven. Half of the surface cooks at a different temp than the other side. I would expect that to maybe happen over years of use not months. My last nonstick griddle was still heating evenly after four years but I had to toss it because the surface was worn. Update: a couple weeks later food is now sticking where the elements are. I DO NOT RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Truthlover

customer_reviews.title: Great for disabled hands.
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously easy to clean since no use of butter/oils. large cooking surface, yet easy to store it. Can Ba challenge to position it depending on outlet location. Drainage hole is on surface thus one might have desired liquids automatically pour into collection dish. Simply pour back on top or create barrier w/ food to close off. Hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix B.

customer_reviews.title: Love my new griddle
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Presto griddles for the past 16 years at least. I have used them mainly to cook bacon, eggs, pancakes, French toast, etc to feed breakfast to a large family - but I also have cook numerous other things on them thru the years. This is the first ceramic one that I have purchased and I love it! Surface is much slicker than the non-stick - and I don't have to worry about the non stick getting damaged or flaking off over time. I have had it a couple of months now and I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: super slick
customer_reviews.text: I don't use any oil on the griddle and my pancakes and eggs don't stick. The griddle cleans up so nicely. It also heated evenly. I also like that it is lighter weight than my old griddle. I wanted to try something different than teflon that always seems to break down after awhile. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: M. More

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective griddle with a low profile that fits in most slim kitchen drawers.
customer_reviews.text: Handy little small kitchen utensil. I bought this to replace the same model with out the ceramic finish. My family uses metal spatulas and the non-stick coating on the previous one had been worn away. We love this handy little griddle so I purchased this upgraded model in hopes the finish will stand up to my family. My one wish is that the back and sides had just a skosh of back splash other than that this is simple and perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile griddle
customer_reviews.text: I have used the griddle almost everyday for various foods-- bacon, eggs, grilled cheese sandwiches, and even toasting items that are too small for the toaster. I am disappointed in that it does not heat evenly. I have been disappointed in that aspect of this griddle.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry G. Belford

customer_reviews.title: The griddle works great. The only problem is the tray that is ...
customer_reviews.text: The griddle works great. The only problem is the tray that is designed to ketch grease. It does not have any way to hold it in place. When the griddle is moved from storage it will slide out and hit the floor. This has happened several times and each time a piece of the tray broke off. The last time it happened I put the tray in the trash. I only use the grid for pancakes and French toast so no grease involves. The tray needs a spring or something to hold it in.
customer_reviews.author: njed

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This griddle is easy to use and do very to use. I have used it twice. Once for grilled sandwiches and then for home made English muffins. This appliance is perfect for my needs. It is small enough for our small family and large enough when we the grandson visit
customer_reviews.author: Charlie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, not like the older models
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted a year. The quality of this product has drop significantly since their older models. It doesn't heat evenly, and the heating element discolors the surface
customer_reviews.author: sshicks

customer_reviews.title: Super investment!  Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally write reviews for products that I purchased, but I'll make an exception here. When I decide to make pancakes, I use Bisquik plus some sugar, cinnamon, vanilla, dry buttermilk powder, baking powder, olive oil, eggs, and milk. Tasty little buggers for my breakfasts. I have 1-1/2 each morning so they will last longer. Expecting them to stick to the griddle like usual, I did a test one. This thing works awesome! Absolutely zero sticking and it's quick too. One of my best investments in quite a while !!!
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Towle

customer_reviews.title: After less than 2 month with normal use(once or twice ...
customer_reviews.text: After less than 2 month with normal use(once or twice a week), things stick to some parts of the griddle.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Having 4 children and a pancake-loving husband, I have become somewhat of an expert on electric griddles! So far, this one has been my favorite! I tend to cook low- to no-oil and so far, haven't needed to add oil or spray to anything I have cooked on this griddle. My new go-to is "lentil wraps"- a lentil and water mixture, that slides off beautifully! Have only used it for a couple months, but hope I get years of fun out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Plant powered mom

customer_reviews.title: Great non-stick
customer_reviews.text: I have used it in my camper. The non-stick surface works almost too well. I had troubles getting the pancakes to slide onto the spatula instead of off the griddle. Eggs cooked great and did not stick. Cooked hamburgers and clean up was easy.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen helper
customer_reviews.text: This makes getting breakfast on the table so much faster and easier. Super easy to clean and nothing sticks to it. Meals are done in a reasonable amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: CandiCrush

customer_reviews.title: LackLuster
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daily countertop use, product works okay and I specifically bought this one because I didn’t see many complaints about the heating element but after about a week, the ceramic is completed cook-stained and looks filthy when it’s out... heating element shows through Ceremic because of burning stains onto ceremic but it still cooks evenly and thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our camper. Love the versatility. We used it for eggs, bacon, pancakes and sandwiches. It is so easy to clean and store. We will be using this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Makes bulk cooking so much easier
customer_reviews.text: I often cook in bulk due to paleo diet. This is great for pancakes, bacon, and tortillas. It's good for eggs but have to be careful as not much of a lip on the edge. The drip drawer also holds more than you think it will.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tassin

customer_reviews.title: More lip
customer_reviews.text: Dislike how the lip is small and grease will run over the side when cooking bacon. Cooks good and even. Smaller than I thought. Over all good would buy same brand but bigger next time.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Morey

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't quite put it in the category of sliced bread, but it's close. Comes up to temperature quickly, seems to heat evenly (certainly a ton better than trying to put a griddle between my two stove burners), a snap to clean, thin so it stores easily, and rather simple construction so it seems as if it'll last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: K.Kahn

customer_reviews.title: Love this easy to use griddle!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and use it a lot. I had a pancake griddle from Presto for about 6 years and used it a few times a week, so I went ahead and bought a new one, it’s even better and easier to clean than my previous non stick griddle, very easy to use and clean, makes great pancakes and eggs, I haven’t tried it for meats yet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Teske

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for a gift
customer_reviews.text: I don't know anything about this. I bought it as a gift. I told them to let me know if something went wrong, I haven't heard anything bad about it.
customer_reviews.author: Olgalucía

customer_reviews.title: The pro & cons.
customer_reviews.text: Takes non-stick to a new level. Good and Bad. Very slick but the back lip is to low. Have a tendency to push cooking items over the edge with trying to pick up with a spatula. The back lip or edge needs to be higher, at least 1/2 inch to stop items like eggs, hamburger patties, sausage patties, etc from sliding off the back edge. Easy to clean, very even temperature, easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, light weight, easy to use griddle. It heats quick, evenly and is easy to clean up. Definitely a great buy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Love me some Pancakes...but hard to flip on this griddle...not much of an edge ( or lip )..so the pancakes start to slide off when picking them up to flip them over. Nothing sticks to it though so that's good.
customer_reviews.author: leeker

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: The ceramic surface is great to cook on and easy to clean. A griddle is much better to cook with than a frying pan - heat control and even heat across cooking surface.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: Use this for cooking while we are out camping in our RV. Very versatile and it gets used a bunch! Great Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kim T

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, cleans very easily and is great when hosting a large group for breakfast! It’s a great price as well. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Coral Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great griddle!
customer_reviews.text: The non-stick surface is better than the one that it replaced, which was sadly smashed to bits when I dropped it on the stone tile after 10 years of reliable use. Looking forward to at least that length of use with the new one.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product it’s great, we use it to make pancakes and cook tortillas.. never disappoints. Very convenient and easy
customer_reviews.author: Maribel

customer_reviews.title: Love this Griddle!
customer_reviews.text: After going through a number of non stick electric griddles that acquire a sticky film no matter how much you clean them, this ceramic surface is a breath of fresh air.
customer_reviews.author: Bill S

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: Heats up quickly and evenly around edges where previous models didnt . Easy to clean . Doesn't scratch like the black top ones did . We use every Sunday for breakfast....pancakes,french toast,pork roll eggs bacon
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: No Teflon. Yay!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older one at our rental cabin. Renters are hard on things like this, so I’ll see how long it lasts - but I tried it myself and I loved it. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F

customer_reviews.title: Hot griddle slides all over counter
customer_reviews.text: The non-stick surface works really well but the whole griddle slides all over the counter. It is missing the little rubber feet that hold it in place. I thought it was a manufacturing defect and wrote to Presto so they could send me the feet so I could install them myself. They wrote back that this model does not come with little rubber feet and recommend putting it on a silicone mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this! My mom bought it for me to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My mom bought it for me to replace the old one she gave me and threw out. My pancakes are never burnt and come out perfectly golden. I love the idea of the dip tray if I cook something very greasy.
customer_reviews.author: KelReilly

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: It’s just a repurchased grill that I love!! Sunday morning breakfast staple!
customer_reviews.author: Dalis L. Strain

customer_reviews.title: Pancake perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very even temperature makes multiple pancakes cook evenly and perfectly. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: db:)

customer_reviews.title: I liked the product but it stopped working in 50 days ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product but it stopped working in 50 days But amazon was great - they agreed to replace unit. Assuming this one keeps working -- will up grade the rating... but as I said amazon was great.
customer_reviews.author: Bobm

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I was Happy to receive the replacement of the Griddle after the first one that I received was damaged
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best I have seen and/or had in years. Hope it will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: glbegr

customer_reviews.title: A breakfast must-have
customer_reviews.text: This griddle has made breakfast in my household so much more efficient. Pancakes, bacon, sausage, eggs, all cooked within minutes. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: KKO

customer_reviews.title: Great little griddle
customer_reviews.text: Love the ceramic top. Very slippery and easy to clean. Usually just run a damp paper towel over it after it cools down to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: It’s a griddle. It’s used for cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Gets up to temp fast. Pretty even cooking across the whole surface. Wipes off and cleans easy.
customer_reviews.author: I buy stuff

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly nonstick.
customer_reviews.text: A pleasure to use, pancakes are evenly golden and after frying bacon it easily wipes clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Kramer

customer_reviews.title: The best countertop griddle
customer_reviews.text: We've tried a few other brands. After about a week of use the other brands go in the trash and we come back to the Presto. The product is tried and true after 20 years of using them. I won't buy any other brands again.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Radcliffe

customer_reviews.title: It gets hot very fast
customer_reviews.text: It gets hot very fast and is not like other ones that when it gets hot it turns off. It keeps hot until you turn it off very good purchase worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: TopacioCristina

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is the best griddle I have ever owned. It cooks evenly and is non-stick, easy to clean. I will never buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Em

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: The right side runs about 5° hotter than the rest of the griddle.otherwise easy to use easy to clean lightweight great for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Only able to use one time before it broke!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and used it successfully one time. One week later I tried to use it again to make food & the heating element kept shorting out. It would start to get warm, then the light would go off and would stop heating up all together. Complete waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pancakes anyone
customer_reviews.text: I think my son enjoys this more than I do. He request pancakes every morning since I first made pancakes on this griddle. The temperature setting is great, easy to clean, doesn't burn food...I love it
customer_reviews.author: Mashyka Powell

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again or recommend this griddle to friends
customer_reviews.text: Love this griddle. Ceramic is was better than the other non stick one I had. It has a nice large surface and seems to cook evenly. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. S.

customer_reviews.title: Handles break easily
customer_reviews.text: Great even heating surface, perfect for making many pancakes, french toast or grilled cheese for hungry kids! I did drop it and the handle broke off. Within 24 hours, I dropped a knife block on it and the other handle broke off. Not the product for someone as clumsy as I am. Luckily, we fixed it with some Gorilla Glue.
customer_reviews.author: Michele K Hillam

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect and was a great price
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it, love, easy to clean, easy to store, makes perfect pancakes
customer_reviews.author: plume de crit

customer_reviews.title: Had to put some "feet" on the back legs to ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to put some "feet" on the back legs to give it enough of an angle for bacon grease to drip in to the catch. Its larger than my old one and clean up is a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Everything I hoped it would be and more. Cooked evenly pancakes, French toast & sausage. Very easy to clean. Love it. Will use often.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Holdingin Reserve....
customer_reviews.text: Not using, but saving for later as I saved my old grill. This one looks like a great one and I have high expectation when I get to using it.
customer_reviews.author: TCTop Contributor: Science Fiction Books

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great, not very heavy, and easy to clean. The surface looks and feels very nice and has done great with no sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Cary

customer_reviews.title: Great electric frying pan
customer_reviews.text: Great electric frying pan. A little wider than my previous model. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: LRE

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Had sourdough pancakes, yummy. Easier to cook on.and no stick
customer_reviews.author: Bill W

customer_reviews.title: Works well for us.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as an anniversary present. My wife loves it and uses it all the time. We haven't noticed problems with uneven heat distribution.
customer_reviews.author: J. Toppins

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: It would have gotten 5 stars, but the grease drawer does NOT stay closed. I have to tape it closed each use.
customer_reviews.author: Janya Comer

customer_reviews.title: Slides around when using.
customer_reviews.text: There are no grips on the bottom of feet it stands on, so it slides all over while using it. Not a fan! Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Risarae

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the money
customer_reviews.text: The first one arrived broken, so Amazon immediately sent out a new one. Works as expected. Good size.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: After a couple months, I was expecting it to start to fall apart. My wife and I use this thing all the time, cooking for the five of us. Usually the pressure from our sink sprayer gets everything off, including egg. Just wipe it down with a soapy towel and spray off. So much better than Teflon!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily
customer_reviews.text: Cooking breakfast for my family has never been easier and faster. So glad I finally bought a griddle. So easy to clean too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicer than expected-
customer_reviews.text: The griddle is much nicer than I expected for the price. I have 3 grandsons whom spend a lot of time with us. This is going to really come in handy.. Oh my goodness I luv Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Castrillon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love Presto griddles! this is the perfect size for my family childcare and family camping. There don't seem to be 'hot spots' and heats/cooks food evenly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stonehocker

customer_reviews.title: Best nonstick ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing griddle!! Best non-stick surface!!! Nothing sticks to it and it cleans up easy every time! Love the large surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, but it works.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap! But it works. We'd opt for a better unit next time.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia greene

customer_reviews.title: Surface lasts much longer and is much less sticky than Teflon ones. By far the best griddle.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this Presto ceramic 07055 cool-touch grill for 7 months and use it every day. It is by far the best griddle I've ever owned. I've owned several of the ones with a black Teflon surface, but the surface gradually flakes off such that in about 6-12 months there is no more black Teflon left. Not one particle of the Presto ceramic surface has yet come off. Furthermore, it is amazing how non-sticky the surface is -- much less sticky than the Teflon ones. Even after 7 months, still nothing sticks to it. Seldom have to clean it because of how non-sticky it is. By far the best griddle ever.

customer_reviews.title: IT COOKS REALLY GOOD. MY HUSBAND LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: MY HUSBAND WANTED A GRIDDLE FOR CHRISTMAS. WHEN IT WAS DELIVERED I WASN'T HOME. SO OF COURSE HE OPENED IT AND HAD BACON FRIED WHEN I GOT HOME. IT COOKS REALLY GOOD. MY HUSBAND LOVES IT. AND I GET OUT OF COOKING ALOT. : ) IT WILL BE USED QUITE OFTEN. WE WOULD RECOMMEND THIS TO ANYONE WHO IS LOOKING FOR A GRIDDLE.

product_meta.title: Presto 07055 Cool-Touch Electric Ceramic Griddle, 20", Black
product_meta.description: Size:20"| Color:BlackCool Touch base on the front and both sides. Ceramic nonstick surface. Fully immersible with the heat control removed. Slide-out drip tray. Great for every meal. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Low-profile design allows the griddle to be used as a buffet server. Ceramic nonstick surface for stick-free cooking and easy cleaning. Big 10 1/2-x 20-inch cooking surface is perfect for family-size meals. Built-in backstop ledge for easy food handling. Heavy cast aluminum base with ceramic nonstick surface and slide-out drip tray. Control Master heat control maintains the desired cooking temperature automatically.
feature_bullets: Cool Touch base on the front and both sides. Ceramic nonstick surface. Fully immersible with the heat control removed
Slide-out drip tray. Great for every meal. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner
Low-profile design allows the griddle to be used as a buffet server. Ceramic nonstick surface for stick-free cooking and easy cleaning
Big 10 1/2-x 20-inch cooking surface is perfect for family-size meals. Built-in backstop ledge for easy food handling
Heavy cast aluminum base with ceramic nonstick surface and slide-out drip tray. Control Master heat control maintains the desired cooking temperature automatically
